group_1.textCenter: Sorry about calling you all out to the middle of@nowhere.

group_1.textLeft: I won't have an issue with it, so long as you@can provide us with a satisfactory explanation.

group_1.textRight: For starters, why are we talking about this@deep in the mountains?!

group_1.textLeft: I knew they'd be angry...

group_1.textRight: Yeah, of course they would be...

group_1.textLeft: Why're you two acting so scared?
To be real with you, my bae knew this was how@things were gonna play out.

group_1.textRight: ...Huh, really?
You mean you expected Takarazaki's current@situation?

group_1.textLeft: Well, something like that★
It's more like, we planned to wait and see if@it got worse.

group_1.textRight: You did...?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I wasn't faking it just to get them on board.
It was my bae's plan to find out the truth.
Kyahaha★

group_1.textRight: You tricked us...
I didn't see that coming, either...
To fool your enemies, you must first@fool your allies...
Like the Magius, you've pulled off a@grand deception.

group_1.textLeft: We actually got that Witch from Alina...

group_1.textRight: Huuuh...?!

group_1.textLeft: However, that made it all the more convincing that@it was the cause of the strange phenomenon.
It would have been suspect, had you@hunted any random Witch...

group_1.textRight: That makes sense, but...
If we take out a strong Witch and have@more problems...
What does that tell us?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I'd like to hear the answer to that, as well.

group_1.textCenter: It's just our speculation, but, I'll just spit it out:

group_1.textRight: Hey, what the hell are you saying?!
You've got it backward! Mitsune's been trying to@solve the situation in Takarazaki!

group_1.textLeft: I'm not just spewing nonsense, you know.
How about you just sit tight and listen first?

group_1.textRight: ...Ngh!
Why do you...think I'm the culprit...?

group_1.narration: "I'll explain it to you step-by-step.@The first thing my bae wanted to investigate was@what the incidents in Takarazaki had in common."
"There were two points to investigate:@'Where the crime happened' and@''the motive of the criminal'."
"Thanks to the Crime Information Map,@we quickly figured out the first point and@found where they were happening."
"The crimes all took place within@the distance of a bus or train ride@from the station where we were meeting up."
"That means that the station is like a crossroads for@criminals, and there are lots of people who can answer@the second question, 'Why did you do it?'"
"So I ambushed them at the station, and bingo!@I was able to hear the motives from the criminals."
"I knew Miwarin was keeping photos to deter repeat offenders,@and that was good material to wring the story out of them."
"By the way, it was the same as when Hagurin got robbed."

group_1.textLeft: I didn't mean to do it...@It was just a sudden impulse...

group_1.textRight: That's what they all say.

group_1.textCenter: "I thought we'd settled the money and the company issues."
"I don't know why I did it."
"I was just joking but ended up doing it."

group_1.textRight: Princess, when did you find that out...?

group_1.textLeft: Before the time you blew up at me and@I went to the sewers?

group_1.textRight: Oh...

group_1.textLeft: I got curious, and I knew something was up.
That's why I went looking into it.

group_1.textRight: There's absolutely nothing in this story@pointing to Mitsune as the culprit.
It seems we're still in the middle of the story.@That isn't the end, I take it?

group_1.textLeft: You get me★

group_1.textRight: ...Umm, but how did you find criminals so easily...?

group_1.textLeft: You showed me that list of criminals with photos.

group_1.textRight: Even though we have the same goal?!@I even showed you the pictures!

group_1.textLeft: I only looked at the pictures because I wanted@the info.
Even if I forget, my bae will tell me.

group_1.textRight: But how could you find them? Even if you know@their faces, it wouldn't be easy...
There are so many people coming and going,@and so many different exits...

group_1.textLeft: Good question, Hagurin★
